We offer food boxes, open market area to select additional bread, fruits and vegetables as well as clothing and household items, hot meals, clothing, toiletries, showers,  haircuts, and laundry mat.", "notes": "Schedule:  9am - Administration opens           - Continental breakfast           - Open Market opens           - Clothing opens           - Toiletries open           - Showers available            - Haircuts available            - Laundry open  11:30am - 2pm - h\u00f2t meals served  1pm - 3pm - Food boxes loaded  3pm - Closed     You may come when we open, leave and come back, or stay and enjoy the day with us!", "contactName": "Rick Harvey", "contactPhone": "501-514-5325", "contactEmail": "soulfoodcafemission@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 72, "regionName": "Arkansas Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1c4a6bd3-8e23-4c7c-b75a-6bd6f5204146.png", "website": "https://arkansasfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
